com.kintone.client

Class FileClient

  • Object

  • public class FileClient
extends Object
    A client that operates file APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadFile

        public InputStream downloadFile(String fileKey)
                         throws IOException
        Downloads files from an attachment field in an app.
        Parameters:
        fileKey - the value that is set on the Attachment field in the response data returned when using the Get Record API
        Returns:
        the content data stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • downloadFile

        public DownloadFileResponseBody downloadFile(DownloadFileRequest request)
        Downloads files from an attachment field in an app.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See DownloadFileRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See DownloadFileResponseBody

      • uploadFile

        public String uploadFile(Path path,
                         String contentType)
                  throws IOException
        Uploads a file to Kintone.
        Parameters:
        path - the file to upload
        contentType - the Content Type of the file.
        Returns:
        the fileKey of the uploaded file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

        Returns:
